title: font reverts to Times Roman
content: What would cause a font to revert to Times Roman besides missing characters? This is happening to me on a Mac in Word. Any help appreciated.
author: paul d hunt

comments.content: See that too, Paul. My luddite dad calls the app “Swear Word” for good reason.

_“Swear Word”_

That’s a good one! so’s it just the app then?
